## Map
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```


```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=5.841292, lng=116.043446, popup="Rumah Nizar")
my_map
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2016-04-25)
lat <- c(3.1478,4.6,5.3942,3.8167,3.0833,1.4556,6.1333,2.1889,5.975,2.7297,1.5397,5.3303,6.1167,2.914,6.4414,5.2803)
lng <- c(101.6953,101.07,100.3664,103.3333,101.5333,103.7611,102.25,102.2511,116.0725,101.9381,110.3542,103.1408,100.3667,101.7019,100.1986,115.2475
)

df <- data.frame(lat, lng)
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers()

```
